title: Minions: Banana!
description: In this deliciously evil hardcover edition, the banana-loving, boiler suit-wearing stars of the summer blockbuster Minions movie are back to cause mayhem in the only way Minions can. Jump inside their underground secret lair and laugh along at the zany comic adventures as the not-so-dastardly henchmen show the lighter side of evil and investigate everything from crazy new inventions to man-eating plants - always with hilarious results!
author: Renaud Collin
